title: Chubby cat rolls off footstool and thuds on to the floor after playful kitten gives him a nudge
text:
Owner Victoria Sheppard, 19, said Ned isn't used to having smaller kitten around

This is the hilarious moment a chubby cat dramatically fell off a footstool while play-fighting with his new furry friend.

The chubby cat, named Fat Ned, six, had a rude awakening when a younger cat sent him to the floor with a thud.

In the footage, Ned had been relaxing in his living room in Barrie in Ontario Province, Canada with his owner.

One-year-old kitten Stella, who is a new arrival to the household, is seen jumping up onto an adjacent sofa, clearly wanting to play with him.

Trying to get closer, Stella jumps from the nearby sofa over Ned who angrily screeches his displeasure at being disturbed.

But as he tries to push her away, he loses his balance and falls on to the floor with a bang.

One-year-old kitten Stella, who is a new arrived to the household, is seen jumping up onto an adjacent sofa, clearly wanting to play with him

Owner Victoria Sheppard, 19, said: 'My poor cat Ned isn't a fan of having a new kitten around.

'My first reaction to the scene was that it was hilarious.'

Victoria regularly posts updates about what Ned is doing - which mostly involves sleeping and eating - to the cat's own social media account.

Trying to get closer, Stella jumps from the nearby couch over Ned who angrily screeches his displeasure at being disturbed
description: Fat Ned, aged six, had been relaxing on a footstool next to owner Victoria Sheppard at home in Barrie, Ontario, when one-year-old kitten Stella decided she wanted to play with him.
